description:
Comfortable sun protection for canoe passengers and sandcastle engineers. The high neckline protects the vulnerable area on the back of the neck, and long sleeves provide full coverage. Bright colourways let them choose the style they’ll love to wear.

  • Made from a soft polyester tricot fabric that resists chlorine and has a UPF 30 rating
  • Flatlocked seams prevent chafing from sand and salt
  • Long sleeves and high mock neck collar extend coverage
  • Centre back length is 45cm in size 5
name: MEC Shadow Sun Shirt - Children
